text.text_translated: Ed's walk was not possible without technology. He had a radio. He asked the people in the big forest with much rain. He asked them for food. He asked them to let him cross their land. Many people came to meet him. They helped him find the way. They helped him in the hardest parts of the land. Ed walked and wrote notes on the internet. He wrote about what happened each day. News people wrote about his trip. Ed took this news. He spoke against destroying the big forest with much rain. He also asked for money. This money was for groups that help nature and children. These groups were in Brazil and Peru.
